name: 凌辱看護婦～地獄責め～
summary: Main character is a former doctor who works for a medical-related foundation. He's in charge of a special medical ward where powerful people hide from the media attention or law enforcement authorities. What they need is good service, not a good doctor. So protagonist trains special medical stuff to satisfy any customer needs.
info:
• 音乐: 平林征児,与猶啓至,Naka-G
  • 原画: さっぽろももこ
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 2003/09/05
  • 开发: 凌辱堂
  • 剧本: 正村誠一 , 硝子丸 , 松本竜 , 佐々木鏡次
